explanation: The bug is in the line where the dictionary 'ds' is being constructed. The values of the dictionary should map from 'd[i]' to 'p[i + 1]' instead of 'p[1 + i]'. This leads to missing the correct value associated with each 'd[i]'. The corrected line ensures we use 'p[i + 1]' to access the correct elements of the list.
